## numberToWord() function

Converts number to their word (en) equivalent. For example, 1 is converted to one and 55 if converted to fifty-five

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function numberToWord(num: number): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | number | Number to convert to it's word equivalent |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined

The word representation of the number provided such as "one" or "fifty-five"
